TopicTitle: Loading a save where a ship is mid-flight after game restart hides trajectory

Articles.Content:
Version: 0.1.0.0.20892

Computer Specs
OS: Windows 11 22H2
CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
GPU: Nvidia GTX 1660 6GB
RAM: 16GB

After restarting the game and loading the last save file where a ship was mid-flight on Kerbin, the trajectory doesn't show, it only starts showing when the craft has reached orbit. Don't know if this has been reported before.
Can confirm this one. Had the same issue when i loaded a save where i was located around the mun
